statements: DELETE FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_id = 1 AND crime_type = 'Burglary';
DELETE FROM CrimeData WHERE crime_date < '2021-05-01' AND crime_location LIKE '%Street%' AND report_date > '2021-08-01';
DELETE FROM suspects WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft' AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM Suspects WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Suspects WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'M';
